item.title: Episode 09: That Belongs in a Museum!
item.description: Listen to the episode on PodBean: console.log("Loaded external content from PodBean.com"); The party find a holy relic of the crusades that was stolen by the cultists. As well as information that could mean life or death for the city above. Follow us on Social Media: Subscribe to Podcast Facebook Twitter Check out Social Introvert’s Soundcloud! Music and Sound by Syrinscape Because Epic Games Need Epic Sound:
